title: Kosygin's Third Government
text: The <a href="Kosygin%27s%20Second%20Government">former government</a> of <a href="Alexei%20Kosygin">Alexei Kosygin</a> was dissolved following the <a href="Soviet%20Union%20legislative%20election%2C%201970">Soviet legislative election</a> of 1970. Kosygin was once again elected Premier by the Politburo and the Central Committee following the election. His third government would last for four years, until the <a href="Soviet%20Union%20legislative%20election%2C%201974">1974 Soviet election</a>.
